languages.text: "Рад видеть, что ты воспряла духом. Мысли о незаконченном деле заметно мешают службе".
languages.translation_comment: Completed Argenta's first quest (to clear out a cultist den on Footfall).

traits.locale_text: "Рад видеть, что ты воспряла духом. Мысли о незаконченном деле заметно мешают службе".

languages.text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."
languages.translation_comment: Completed Argenta's first quest (to clear out a cultist den on Footfall).

languages.text: 「元気そうで何よりだ。やり残したことへの未練は、任務の妨げになるからな」
languages.original_text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."

traits.locale_text: 「元気そうで何よりだ。やり残したことへの未練は、任務の妨げになるからな」

languages.text: "Schön, dass Ihr so guter Laune seid. Gedanken über unerledigte Aufgaben kommen der Pflicht nur in die Quere."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, dass Ihr so guter Laune seid. Gedanken über unerledigte Aufgaben kommen der Pflicht nur in die Quere."

languages.text: « Je suis ravi de vous voir d'aussi bonne humeur. On ne peut pas se concentrer sur sa mission quand on s'appesantit sur le passé. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi de vous voir d'aussi bonne humeur. On ne peut pas se concentrer sur sa mission quand on s'appesantit sur le passé. »

languages.text: «Me alegra verla de tan buen humor. Obsesionarse con asuntos pendientes interfiere con el cumplimiento del deber».
languages.original_text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra verla de tan buen humor. Obsesionarse con asuntos pendientes interfiere con el cumplimiento del deber».

languages.text: “看到你容光焕发，我很高兴。如果总是想着没能完成的职责，这只会耽误履行职责。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."

traits.locale_text: “看到你容光焕发，我很高兴。如果总是想着没能完成的职责，这只会耽误履行职责。”

languages.text: "Seni çok iyi gördüm. Yarım kalan işi düşündükçe vazifeye odaklanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to see you in high spirits. Thoughts about unfinished business get in the way of duty."

traits.locale_text: "Seni çok iyi gördüm. Yarım kalan işi düşündükçe vazifeye odaklanamıyorum."
